Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, View, Serializable
public class VirtualView extends Object implements View
this class implements methods to send message to a specific client
